nodes.text: A tower farm was located on the Rooted Moon of Hetzal Prime during the High Republic Era. In 232 BBY, when the Great Hyperspace Disaster threatened the Hetzal system with large amounts of hyperspace debris, a system-wide evacuation order was issued. The family that owned the farm had difficulty, as their daughter suffered a seizure due to the stress of the evacuation. When the Jedi Order and Galactic Republic mounted an effort to assist the Hetzal system, Jedi Knight Rah Barocci wound up at the farm to assist the family and their daughter. Barocci was able to calm the daughter's crisis, but later fell to his death off of the tower farm out of exhaustion while participating in a combined Jedi effort, led by Jedi Master Avar Kriss, to prevent a liquid Tibanna tank from colliding with the largest of the Hetzal system's three suns.
The tower farm first appeared in the 2021 novel The High Republic: Light of the Jedi.
